about_the_game:
Dress up your crew with this set of six outfits inspired by the ruthless bosses of Hi-Fi RUSH! The Bossplay Costume Pack contains six cosmetic outfits, one per character, and can be accessed via the Hideout in-game.

Switch up your style for your next playthrough or show off the new threads in Photo Mode – being bad never looked so good!

Note: The Bossplay Costume Pack is available subject to purchase and contains content not included in the base game or the Hi-Fi RUSH Deluxe Edition. Hi-Fi RUSH base game is required to access the Bossplay Costume Pack.
